org.ubiety.ubigraph
Class UbigraphClient

java.lang.Object
  org.ubiety.ubigraph.UbigraphClient

public class UbigraphClient
extends java.lang.Object

Java language interface to a Ubigraph server via XMLRPC.

Constructor Detail

UbigraphClient

public UbigraphClient()
Connects to the ubigraph server. By default, the url http://127.0.0.1:20738/RPC2 (localhost, port 20738) is used.

UbigraphClient

public UbigraphClient(java.lang.String url)
Connects to the ubigraph server using an alternate URL.

Method Detail

public int newVertex()
Create a new vertex.

Returns:
The vertexId of the new vertex.

newVertex

public int newVertex(int vertexId)
Create a new vertex with a specified vertexId.

Returns:
0 if success, -1 if failure (a vertex with that id exists already).

removeVertex

Deletes the vertex.

Returns:
0 if success, -1 if failure.

newEdge

public int newEdge(int edgeId,
                   int i,
                   int j)
Create a new edge with a specified edgeId.

Returns:
0 if success, -1 if failure (edge already exists).

removeEdge

public int removeEdge(int edgeId)
Removes an edge.

Returns:
0 if success, -1 if failure (edge does not exist).

setVertexAttribute

public int setVertexAttribute(int vertexId,
                              java.lang.String attribute,
                              java.lang.String value)
Set an attribute of a vertex. See the Ubigraph XMLRPC manual for details of what attributes can be set. Some basic attributes are:
  • shape: sphere, cone, torus, tetrahedron, cube, octahedron, dodecahedron, icosahedron
  • label: a string to be displayed near the vertex
  • color: e.g. "#ff0000"

Parameters:
attribute - The name of the attribute to be changed, e.g., "color", "shape", "label", etc.
value - The new value for the attribute.

newVertexStyle

public int newVertexStyle(int parent_styleId)
Create a new vertex style.

Parameters:
parent_styleId - The style on which to base the new style. Use 0 for the default vertex style.
Returns:
styleId

newVertexStyle

public int newVertexStyle(int styleId,
                          int parent_styleId)
Create a new vertex style.

Parameters:
styleId - The desired styleId to create.
parent_styleId - The style on which to base the new style. Use 0 for the default vertex style.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 if the desired styleId already exists

setVertexStyleAttribute

public int setVertexStyleAttribute(int styleId,
                                   java.lang.String attribute,
                                   java.lang.String value)
Set an attribute of a style. See also setVertexAttribute().

Parameters:
styleId - The style to modify. Use 0 for the default vertex style.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

changeVertexStyle

public int changeVertexStyle(int vertexId,
                             int styleId)
Change a vertex to a specified style

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

newEdgeStyle

public int newEdgeStyle(int parent_styleId)
Create a new edge style.

Parameters:
parent_styleId - The style on which to base the new style. Use 0 for the default edge style.
Returns:
styleId

newEdgeStyle

public int newEdgeStyle(int styleId,
                        int parent_styleId)
Create a new edge style.

Parameters:
styleId - The desired styleId to create.
parent_styleId - The style on which to base the new style. Use 0 for the default edge style.
Returns:
0 if success, -1 if styleId is already in use.

setEdgeStyleAttribute

                                 java.lang.String attribute,
                                 java.lang.String value)
Set an attribute of a style. See also setVertexAttribute().

styleId - The style to modify. Use 0 for the default edge style.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

                           int styleId)
Change an edge to a specified style

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

clear

public int clear()
Remove all vertices and edges from the graph, and reset styles.
